description.value: Your Kirin ancestry bestows upon you the resilience of the mythical chimeras, reflected in the toughness of your scales. Select a second type of damage: fire, cold, electricity, acid, or sonic. Your scales harden, providing resistance to your chosen damage type, equal to half your level. Once the selection is made, it cannot be changed. If you select the same type of damage resistance as you have with Dragon Scales, increase your resistance to equal your level for that damage type instead.
